meanings.definition: The state or quality of being a superstar.
meanings.sent1: Her superstardoms in music and acting brought her fame and recognition.
meanings.sent2: Many dream of achieving the superstardoms that come with being a famous athlete.
meanings.sent3: Despite his humble beginnings, he reached the superstardoms of Hollywood.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, reaching superstardoms is like winning a golden ticket.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of superstardoms can sometimes overshadow the hard work behind it.

meanings.definition: The status or position of a superstar.
meanings.sent1: The superstardoms of the singer allowed her to perform on the biggest stages.
meanings.sent2: His superstardoms in the film industry made him a household name.
meanings.sent3: Even in a small town, his superstardoms were known far and wide.
meanings.sent4: She ascended to the superstardoms of the business world with determination and skill.
meanings.sent5: The allure of superstardoms can sometimes cloud one's true values and beliefs.
